text:
The husband got me flowers for my birthday from Eflora and it was beautiful, generously sized, and very fresh.

Update: Another beautiful bouquet by Eflora for our wedding anniversary.
I ordered 2 bouquets for my friends and the flower arrangements were gorgeous - my friends loved them! Thank you!
Brilliant service. Got the bouquet for our anniversary. Came in without appointment and the nice lady was accommodating and got the bouquet done in under an hour. Will recommend this to everyone!

This florist is a true GEM. I came in last minute wanting to get a bouquet for my aunt’s birthday that’s today and she gave me the liberty to choose the flowers and the colour scheme I want which is really nice and even added more leaves and just made the flower arrangement incredible. She’s been working at e flora for about 45 years and is truly the sweetest lady ever :)
Getting a bouquet like this online or even in stores are usually $100+ on average, sometimes even more but I got this for $60 and considering the fact that she made this arrangement on the spot - $60 really is an amazing price.
Nancy has been providing one of the best flora arrangements since day 1. Simply love her sunflowers! Many regular customers!
